name: Seeker (itch) (KilaKing)
description:
A flower lost itself and looked for its scattered memory in the forest. She always thinks something is attracting her. She follows the attraction of the cube and looks for her memory step by step. And she wanted to know what attracted her. Finally found his birthplace. Flowers feel very comfortable here. The flower finally found the place she yearned for.

Players only can move between land and land.

When player touch the Enemy, It will cause players to lose 33 HP

When player touch the Health point, add 25HP

When the player's HP = 0, Game will restart.

When the player gets the cube, the player can get some score.

Red cube = 15        Yellow cube = 5      Blue Cube = 10
